1.1.2.name: wordpress/widget-to-search-from-ofruru
1.1.2.description:
Enables a Custom Search Engine for your site via a widget.

Features:

  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • Just add the "Site Search" widget to your theme.
  • Does not replace the default WordPress search. It runs along with it. Use both if you want.

This plugin is built and maintained by http://ofru.ru/widgets/?l=en

Plugin Forums

  • http://forum.ofru.ru/viewforum.php?f=55
